modDesc.title: Crider Manor
modDesc.description: Step into the grandeur of the Crider Manor — a stunning, hand-crafted estate brought from history into the heart of Farming Simulator 25. Designed with Southern elegance and modern precision, this farmhouse features: • A functional sleep trigger for your character • Authentic RDR2-inspired design re-engineered for FS25 • High-detail textures and custom lighting • Console-ready optimization Authored by Jessie Crider (CriderGPT).
